text: Manusake ai dinera bhaya pradarsana karuna, yedina tadera kache ayaba asabe. Takhana jalemara balabeh he amadera palanakarta, amaderake saman'ya meyada paryanta samaya dina, yate amara apanara ahabane sara dite ebam payagambaraganera anusarana karate pari. Tomara ki itopurbe kasama khete na ye, tomaderake duniya theke yete habe na
